## Introduction
```{r setupEnvironment, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(caret)
library(choroplethr)
library(choroplethrMaps)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(ggmap)
library(zipcode)

data(state.regions)

source("./dataCleaning.R")
source("./dataAnalysis.R")
set.seed(58978160)

dataDirectory <- "./Data"
analyticDataPath <- "./AnalyticData"
maximumPercentMissing <- 10

if (is.na(file.info(dataDirectory)[1,"isdir"])) {
    downloadData(dataDirectory)
}

if (is.na(file.info(file.path(analyticDataPath,
                              "/trainingData.csv"))[1,"size"])) {
    createAnalyticDataset(dataDirectory,
                          maximumPercentMissing)
}
```
